DOC.brief_summary: This observational study unstimulated bone marrow ( BM ) filgrastim-mobilized peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) donor . The primary goal evaluate hypothesis incidence target malignant , thrombotic autoimmune disorder unrelated hematopoietic stem cell donation similar unstimulated BM filgrastim-mobilized PBSC donor .
DOC.brief_title: National Marrow Donor Program Long-Term Donor Follow-Up
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study unstimulated bone marrow ( BM ) filgrastim-mobilized peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) donor . The primary goal evaluate hypothesis incidence target malignant , thrombotic autoimmune disorder unrelated hematopoietic stem cell donation similar unstimulated BM filgrastim-mobilized PBSC donor . Donors undergo biennial survey study completion . Cases target disorder review medical monitor confirm veracity report .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Unrelated donor donate either unstimulated BM filgrastimmobilized PBSC July 1 , 1999 approximately five year post study activation . 2 . Unrelated donor receive least one injection filgrastim , donate filgrastimmobilized PBSC July 1 , 1999 approximately five year post study activation . 3 . Donation manage U.S. NMDP donor center . 4 . Signed informed consent participation longterm donor followup study . Concurrent enrollment study permit . 1 . Unrelated donor donate filgrastimmobilized bone marrow . 2 . Donation manage nonU.S . donor center . 3 . Donor unable verbally communicate follow language : English , Spanish , Mandarin Chinese , Cantonese Chinese , Vietnamese , Korean , Portuguese .
